markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup>

Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.
name: Necromancy
